revised_title: Effects of Auximones on the Growth of Lemna minor in Mineral Culture Solutions
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to study the effects of organic growth-promoting substances (auximones) on the growth of Lemna minor plants in mineral culture solutions. They found that the presence of auximones significantly increased the growth and health of the plants, with a 197% increase in number over the control group. Microscopic investigation also revealed differences in the internal structure of the plants, with more compact tissues and fewer air spaces in the auximone-treated plants.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biology
